metadata.title: CVE-2024-46705 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe: reset mmio mappings with devmSet our various mmio mappings to NULL. This should make it easier tocatch something rogue trying to mess with mmio after device removal. Forexample, we might unmap everything and then start hitting some mmioaddress which has already been unmamped by us and then remapped bysomething else, causing all kinds of carnage.
